items.sentence: Feel free to speak in French. Everyone here can understand French.
You don't need to tell me your opinion. I already know what it is.
Tom thought that Mary should go over to John's house and help him.
Tom described to the police officer how the accident had happened.
Tom wasn't sure why he was considered the spokesman for the group.
We buy milk and eggs from a farm about three miles from our house.
The toys Tom made sold like hotcakes at the flea market last week.
I've been having a lot more fun here in Boston than I expected to.
Tom is always trying to come up with a new way to make more money.
Tom got in his truck and drove off, and we haven't seen him since.
